message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its value, I believe it's worth $14,000 to secure this opportunity. Please let me know if this aligns with your expectations.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the product,  $14,000 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $12,500 for it. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your budget constraints. In light of that, I would like to propose a price of $13,500 for the product. This offers a middle ground between our previous offers. I hope this suggestion will be more suitable for your needs.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $13,500 is still a bit high for me.  I'm ready to close the deal right now at $13,000. Let's make this happen.
